hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Allah forgives my followers those (evil deeds) their souls may whisper or suggest to them as long as they do not act (on it) or speak

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ إِذَا حَنِثَ نَاسِيًا فِي الأَيْمَانِ
chapter.eng-name: If someone does something against his oath due to forgetfulness
